title: WHO GDHCN Payload Types Schema
description: JSON Schema for WHO GDHCN Payload Types ValueSet codes. Generated from FHIR expansions using IRI format.
narrative: This schema validates IRI-formatted codes for the WHO GDHCN Payload Types ValueSet. Each enum value includes the system URI in the format {systemuri}#{code} to match JSON-LD enumeration IRIs. Display values are available at http://smart.who.int/trust/ValueSet-PayloadTypes.displays.json. For a complete listing of all ValueSets, see artifacts.html#terminology-value-sets.
